overview: Sin City Ultra presents Finnish sex bomb "Karina" in her first starring role as the sexual animal Angels, whose perverse imagination lets her expose her dark, hungry desires in love letters to the infamous novelist D. Klein who coon develops a strange obsession with the lusty Angela and sets up a rendezvous at a mysterious house far from the prying eyes of his girlfriend. From the sexually intense to the totally extreme the decadent would of Angela envelopes him like a womb... from which there is no escape...
tagline: Be Careful what You Wish for, You Just Might get it in THE END
title: Love Letters
